articles.title: Golden girl Betty White dies aged 99, just shy of her 100th birthday - CNA
articles.description: Comedic actress Betty White, who capped a career of more than 80 years by becoming America's geriatric sweetheart after Emmy-winning roles on television sitcoms The Golden Girls and The Mary Tyler Moore Show, has died, less than three weeks shy of her 100th b…

articles.title: Sad confirmation about tennis legend - NEWS.com.au
articles.description: American legend Venus Williams will not play in next month’s Australian Open, meaning an emerging Australian will secure the last women’s singles wildcard.

articles.title: ‘Two paths’: Biden and Putin call yields threats, diplomacy - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: The Russian President told his American counterpart that a breakdown in ties “would be a mistake that our descendants would see as a huge error”.
articles.content: It would be a colossal mistake that would entail grave consequences, Ushakov said. He added that Putin told Biden that Russia would act as the US would if offensive weapons were deployed near America… [+2662 chars]
